content.title: Go
content.description: God calls us to embody Jesus to the world around us. We want to intentionally invest in introducing spiritually curious people to the Jesus-centred life, through a movement of Jesus-centred churches.

image1.alt: A Pastor from The Meeting House is speaking to the camera as host during a Sunday morning livestream.

content.text1: God calls us to embody Jesus to the world around us. We want to intentionally invest in introducing spiritually curious people to the Jesus-centred life, through a movement of Jesus-centred churches.

We're excited to invest in a number of special projects over the next few years that are generating stories of impact like the ones above. If youâ€™re wondering "How can I make a difference?" this is our chance to be radically generous, and create even more Kingdom impact. The benefit of these initiatives is felt in our Meeting House church communities, and beyond our borders across the broader Jesus-centred movement.

content.header1: Some of the special projects already underway:

body.text: Fueling creative new expressions of church and neighbourhood outreach to engage more spiritually curious people, and offer steps into Jesus-centred community.
Revitalizing our vision for Home church and offering a range of TMHU courses to help people take meaningful steps in their discipleship.
Developing tomorrow's leaders today through intentional mentoring and relational investment in our next generation.
Enabling us to communicate the good news further and more effectively through investments in new equipment, our online presence, and digital ministry tools.
Planting and integrating new Meeting House church expressions within and beyond Southern Ontario.
Embracing our role as leaders in the growing Anabaptist movement by forming a relational network of like-minded churches and ministry leaders to make more disciples around the world.
Allowing us to share our awesome Kids and Youth curriculum in a sustainable way with churches who need it most.

content.text1: Our goal is to raise $4.5m by mid-2023 to fuel this important work. You can add your support today by giving to The Meeting House Go Fund.

image1.alt: Group of friends hanging out at The Meeting House church talking about our Go campaign.
